block.peripheralworks.display_pedestal.t: §3§oCute pedestal, that cannot store anything, but can display literally anything
block.peripheralworks.entity_link.toolti: §3§oCan help you to create interspace link to any entity, you just need to insert card
block.peripheralworks.informative_regist: §3§oKnowledge device, that holds power to list all items in existence
block.peripheralworks.item_pedestal.tool: §3§oCute pedestal, that can store only single item stack. But seems you can get more information about this stack now
block.peripheralworks.map_pedestal.toolt: §3§oCute pedestal, that can store only single item stack. Infused with compass, it now can understand maps
block.peripheralworks.peripheral_proxy.t: §3§oAllows you to connect peripherals at the small distances without wired network
block.peripheralworks.reality_forger.too: §3§oComplex device, that can forge reality anchors to something else
block.peripheralworks.recipe_registry.to: §3§oKnowledge device, that holds power to understand any recipe but sometimes luck power to provide information about it
block.peripheralworks.remote_observer.to: §3§oJust like observer, but can see a little further
block.peripheralworks.statue_workbench.t: §3§oImagination your only limit. And also 48 point size limit, but this is not so important
block.peripheralworks.ultimate_sensor.to: §3§oLimitless possibilities for understanding world in one little box. Works with turtles and pocket computers
§3§oBest tool to inspect surroundings, if you don't have third eye. Works with turtles and pocket computers
item.peripheralworks.analyzer.tooltip: §3§oWIP tool that now can only display block entity type of blocks
item.peripheralworks.entity_card.tooltip: §3§oCan record unique signature of some living or ephemeral entities
item.peripheralworks.ultimate_configurat: §3§oOne tool to configure them all. Crouch click on any block to check if it configurable
